```{r}

library(mosaic)
heartrate  <- read.csv("~/code/try_things_here/STATS/gentle/heartrate.csv")
head(heartrate)
ggplot(heartrate) + 
  geom_point(aes(x=age, y=hrmax)) + 
  geom_smooth(aes(x=age, y=hrmax), method='lm')
model_hr = lm(hrmax ~ age, data=heartrate)
summary(model_hr)
coef(model_hr)
fitted(model_hr) %>%
   head(5)
```
